gold.user: User wants to retrieve all network configurations for their organization to review current settings and ensure compliance with security policies.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of network configurations with details such as ID, name, and status.

gold.user: User needs to create a new network configuration for their organization to support a new project that requires specific network settings.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new network configuration and returns the created configuration's details including ID and status.

gold.user: User wants to get details of a specific network configuration to troubleshoot an issue related to network connectivity.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified network configuration including settings and status.

gold.user: User needs to update an existing network configuration to change the IP range to accommodate new devices in the network.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the network configuration and returns the updated configuration details.

gold.user: User wants to delete an obsolete network configuration that is no longer in use to clean up the organization's settings.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified network configuration and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User is looking to retrieve the network settings for their organization to ensure they align with the latest compliance requirements.
gold.ideal: Returns the current network settings including DNS, gateway, and other relevant configurations.
